data.comment: The first-half is under way at Stade Maurice Dufrasne - Cercle Brugge kick-off to start the match.
The first half has been concluded at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway. Liege with the kick-off.
Liege take a 1-0 lead thanks to Samuel Bastien.
Felipe Avenatti (Liege) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 73, Dino Hotic is booked for the away team.
Cercle Brugge make their first substitution with Alexander Corryn replacing Kylian Hazard.
The home team replace Maxime Lestienne with Abdoul Tapsoba.
In the minute 80, Thibo Somers is replacing Guy Carel Mbenza Kamboleke for Cercle Brugge at Stade Maurice Dufrasne.
Duje Cop is replacing Selim Amallah for the home team.
